page.title: 10SEWAGE TREATMENT 1
page.content:
Sewage is a mixture of substances from washing up water and waste to rain water which is cleaned and put back in the rivers to use again.
{PRELIMINARY TREATMENT.}The sewage when arrived at the plant carries rags,paper and large stones.These items have to be screened or it will block sewage flows and pipes.The method for this is that the sewage is passed through a screen were it is disposed of separately.
{PRIMARY TREATMENT.}SETTLEMENT.the sewage is passed through settling or sedimentation tanks so slowly that fine particles settle to the bottom where it is then called sludge.The sludge will be removed frequently each day for treatment or disposal.
